content.original: ACTION: Overcharge your Mech's system to gain +1 Accuracy, +10% Damage, -10% Heat Generated and cool 40 Heat. Generate 10 Extra Heat per turn during the 4 Turn Cooldown.
content.prevOriginal: ACTION: Overcharge your Mech's system to gain +1 Accuracy, +10% Damage, -10% Heat Generated and cool 40 Heat. Generate 10 Extra Heat per turn during the 4 Turn Cooldown.
content.content: АКТИВАЦИЯ: перегружает системы меха ради получения +1 к точности, +10% к урону, -10% к нагреву и 40 ед. охлаждения. Даёт 10 доп. нагрева за ход во время 4 ходов перезарядки.

content.original: ACTION: A deadly precision Attack with 50% extra damage, +2 chance to hit and 30% reduced DFA self damage. Works for both DFA and Melee attacks. 4 turn cooldown with -1 defense. +1 Ini Injury&Melee Resist.
content.prevOriginal: ACTION: A deadly precision Attack with 50% extra damage, +2 chance to hit and 30% reduced DFA self damage. Works for both DFA and Melee attacks. 4 turn cooldown with -1 defense. +1 Ini Injury&Melee Resist.
content.content: АКТИВАЦИЯ: высокоточная атака с 50% доп. урона, +2 шансом попасть и -30% DFA-урона по себе. Работает как для DFA, так и для рукоп. атак. Перезарядка 4 хода при -1 защиты. +1 к баз. сопр. ранению пилота.
Рукоп. атаки наносят на 10% больше урона.

content.prevOriginal: ACTION: Gain enhanced ability to avoid damage for 2 turns, with a flat +2 increase in evasion with any movement. This can exceed your maximum allowed. Visibility and Signature reduced by 50% for the duration. Has a 5 turn cooldown.
